projects.name: Personal Website
description: - Developed a personal website to showcase my experience and skills
- Created the website with Javascript, HTML, and CSS
- Deployed the website with Github Pages

projects.name: ChatGPT Prompt and Context Manager Chrome Extension
description: - Added features to an existing Chrome Extension for ChatGPT workflow functionality
- Features include prompt injection, context management, and prompt organization

projects.name: ThoughtNode Python Module
description: - Developed ThoughtNode, a Python module that improves information accessibility
- ThoughtNode is an automated email digest system that provides AI generated insights, obtained from web-scraped data on selected topics

projects.name: LLM Chain-of-Thought Reasoning Paper
description: - Implemented Chain-of-Thought Reasoning for a Language Model with Columbia University peers, Shayan Chowdhury and Priscilla Zhu
- Fine-tuned Meta’s Llama-3.1-8B with Google’s Gemini 1.5 Pro as an evaluator of the models reponses to questions from the AGIEval Math dataset
